_header: In this tree is all His might
_description: Satan’s reply to Adam and Eve — six lines

OxfMert248.First Lines:
In ys thre es alle hys mythbot þor he ley and sate nowth
                    rych…
OxfMert248.Last Lines:
…and witty sal tow be god and ywel for so wite al so wille as
                    he
OxfMert248.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             “Sermons and Miracle Plays.” 
             Modern Language Notes
         49 (1934): 394-96: 393-5.
